paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD
import org.apache.spark.util.IntParam
import org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util.GraphGenerators
import org.apache.spark.util.StatCounter


  def parseFlight(str: String): Flight = {
    val line = str.split(",")
    Flight(line(0)+line(4), line(0), line(1), line(2), line(3), line(4).toInt, line(5).toLong, 
           line(6), line(7).toLong, line(8), line(9).toDouble, line(10).toDouble, 
           line(11).toDouble, line(12).toDouble, line(13).toDouble, line(14).toDouble, line(15).toDouble, line(16).toInt)
  }
  //Create RDD with the January 2014 data 
  val textRDD = sc.textFile("data/rita2014jan.csv")

  val flightsRDD = textRDD.map(parseFlight).cache()
  flightsRDD.take(1)

%spark

  val airports = flightsRDD.map(flight => (flight.org_id, flight.origin)).distinct
  airports.take(1)
  val airportOriginsRDD = airports.map(airport => AirportOrigin(airport._1, airport._2))

paragraphs.text:
%spark

import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.lib.ShortestPaths

val result = ShortestPaths.run(graph, Seq(11150L))
result.vertices.take(10)
result.edges.take(10)

val shortestPath0 = result                      // result is a graph
  .vertices
  .filter({case(vId, _) => vId == 10268L})      // we filter to get only the shortest path from v1

shortestPath0.take(10)

val shortestPath = result                      // result is a graph
  .vertices                                     // we get the vertices RDD
  .filter({case(vId, _) => vId == 10268L})      // we filter to get only the shortest path from v1
  .first                                        // there's only one value
  
val shortestPathFor11150 = result                      // result is a graph
  .vertices                                     // we get the vertices RDD
  .filter({case(vId, _) => vId == 10268L})      // we filter to get only the shortest path from v1
  .first                                        // there's only one value
  ._2                                           // the result is a tuple (v1, Map)
  .get(11150L)                                  // we get its shortest path to v2 as an Option object
